page.title: 15Recreation.Leisure facilties
page.content: A new extension has recently been added to the Chepstow Leisure Centre This extension took 1year 9months to complete.Altogether the cost came to Â£1\ million.The Leisure Centre now has many more facilities including a new sports hall,a weight training room,a new bar and also a youth and community room.Altogether 400,000 people attend the centre every year making an average of 7,700 a week.Because of the new extension a lot more people have to be employed.Over 80 people are employed in the Leisure Centre.There are now special groups using the Centre.On Saturday there is a group for the Mentally handicapped and on Sunday there is a group for the Physically handicapped.The people of Chepstow are very pleased with their new Leisure Centre.
